the Client:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"adidas is one of the world’s largest sports providers that designs and manufactures shoes, clothing, and accessories. \\rIt has its roots in Germany, but they are a truly global company. Around the world, they employ over 59,000 people. Employees from about 100 nations are working at the global HQ in Herzogenaurach, Germany – the ‘World of Sports’.  In 2022 adidas produced 1,018 million pieces \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(2021: 938 million pieces) \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"of sports and sports lifestyle products with independent manufacturing partners worldwide and generated net sales of €22,5 billion \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(2021: 21,23 billion)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". These numbers alone can easily suggest that adidas is quite a large and also multifaceted organization. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It’s all about sport\\r:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This is where adidas come from, everything they do is rooted in sport. And sport plays an increasingly important role in more and more people’s lives, on and off the field of play. Sport is central to every culture and society and is core to an individual’s health and happiness. Therefore, adidas believes that, through sport, they have the power to change lives. This core belief guides how adidas runs the company, how they work with their partners, create their products, and engage with their consumers.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
